Title: Microsoft Viva: Multilingual Support in Copilot for Viva Glint
Description:
Copilot in Viva Glint is expanding its capabilities to support multilingual interactions, allowing users to submit prompts and receive responses in their preferred language. This enhancement improves accessibility and usability for global organizations by enabling Copilot to detect the language of user input, and return responses in the same language.
GA date: November CY2025
